title: Texas Instrument placement for Product Marketing Engineer role
content: Hi , Heard that this time Texas also came for product marketing engineer role . What is the scope and can someone share your interview experience with compensation they offered

comments.body: Can you send the link of the sheet or a snapshot ? I don’t have access to it .
check the pes university discord server
It’s mentioned as 38.5 but I heard only analog / digital and embedded roles got a CTC of above . It is lesser for Product Marketing Engineer role
Only one mech person got internship there.
There is one ECE student who got it as well . Mentioned in the sheet
